problem_names:
lemma G_Quotient:
  fixes T_l1 :: "'l1 \<Rightarrow> 'l1' \<Rightarrow> bool" and T_l2 :: "'l2 \<Rightarrow> 'l2' \<Rightarrow> bool"
    and tytok :: "('l1 \<times> 'l1' \<times> 'l1 \<times> 'l2 \<times> 'l2' \<times> 'l2 \<times> 'f) itself"
  assumes "Quotient R_l1 Abs_l1 Rep_l1 T_l1" and "Quotient R_l2 Abs_l2 Rep_l2 T_l2"
    and "Quotient R_co1 Abs_co1 Rep_co1 T_co1" and "Quotient R_co2 Abs_co2 Rep_co2 T_co2"
    and "Quotient R_contra1 Abs_contra1 Rep_contra1 T_contra1"
    and "Quotient R_contra2 Abs_contra2 Rep_contra2 T_contra2"
    and "rel_G_pos_distr_cond T_co1 T_co1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_co2 T_co2\<inverse>\<inverse> T_contra1 T_contra1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_contra2 T_contra2\<inverse>\<inverse>
      tytok"
  shows "Quotient (rel_G R_l1 R_l2 R_co1 R_co2 R_contra1 R_contra2)
    (map_G Abs_l1 Abs_l2 Abs_co1 Abs_co2 Rep_contra1 Rep_contra2)                             
    (map_G Rep_l1 Rep_l2 Rep_co1 Rep_co2 Abs_contra1 Abs_contra2)
    (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 :: (_, _, _, _, _, _, 'f) G \<Rightarrow> _)"
translations:
lemma G_Quotient:
  fixes T_l1 :: "'l1 \<Rightarrow> 'l1' \<Rightarrow> bool" and T_l2 :: "'l2 \<Rightarrow> 'l2' \<Rightarrow> bool"
    and tytok :: "('l1 \<times> 'l1' \<times> 'l1 \<times> 'l2 \<times> 'l2' \<times> 'l2 \<times> 'f) itself"
  assumes "Quotient R_l1 Abs_l1 Rep_l1 T_l1" and "Quotient R_l2 Abs_l2 Rep_l2 T_l2"
    and "Quotient R_co1 Abs_co1 Rep_co1 T_co1" and "Quotient R_co2 Abs_co2 Rep_co2 T_co2"
    and "Quotient R_contra1 Abs_contra1 Rep_contra1 T_contra1"
    and "Quotient R_contra2 Abs_contra2 Rep_contra2 T_contra2"
    and "rel_G_pos_distr_cond T_co1 T_co1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_co2 T_co2\<inverse>\<inverse> T_contra1 T_contra1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_contra2 T_contra2\<inverse>\<inverse>
      tytok"
  shows "Quotient (rel_G R_l1 R_l2 R_co1 R_co2 R_contra1 R_contra2)
    (map_G Abs_l1 Abs_l2 Abs_co1 Abs_co2 Rep_contra1 Rep_contra2)                             
    (map_G Rep_l1 Rep_l2 Rep_co1 Rep_co2 Abs_contra1 Abs_contra2)
    (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 :: (_, _, _, _, _, _, 'f) G \<Rightarrow> _)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Quotient (rel_G R_l1 R_l2 R_co1 R_co2 R_contra1 R_contra2)
     (map_G Abs_l1 Abs_l2 Abs_co1 Abs_co2 Rep_contra1 Rep_contra2)
     (map_G Rep_l1 Rep_l2 Rep_co1 Rep_co2 Abs_contra1 Abs_contra2)
     (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2)
unfolding Quotient_alt_def5

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2
    \<le> Grp UNIV
           (map_G Abs_l1 Abs_l2 Abs_co1 Abs_co2 Rep_contra1
             Rep_contra2) \<and>
    Grp UNIV (map_G Rep_l1 Rep_l2 Rep_co1 Rep_co2 Abs_contra1 Abs_contra2)
    \<le> (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1
            T_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse> \<and>
    rel_G R_l1 R_l2 R_co1 R_co2 R_contra1 R_contra2 =
    rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 OO
    (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>
proof (intro conjI, goal_cases)

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2
    \<le> Grp UNIV
           (map_G Abs_l1 Abs_l2 Abs_co1 Abs_co2 Rep_contra1 Rep_contra2)
 2. Grp UNIV (map_G Rep_l1 Rep_l2 Rep_co1 Rep_co2 Abs_contra1 Abs_contra2)
    \<le> (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1
            T_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>
 3. rel_G R_l1 R_l2 R_co1 R_co2 R_contra1 R_contra2 =
    rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 OO
    (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>
case 1

proof (state)
this:
  

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2
    \<le> Grp UNIV
           (map_G Abs_l1 Abs_l2 Abs_co1 Abs_co2 Rep_contra1 Rep_contra2)
 2. Grp UNIV (map_G Rep_l1 Rep_l2 Rep_co1 Rep_co2 Abs_contra1 Abs_contra2)
    \<le> (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1

    (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>

have "rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 \<le>
    rel_G (Grp UNIV Abs_l1) (Grp UNIV Abs_l2) (Grp UNIV Abs_co1) (Grp UNIV Abs_co2)
    (Grp UNIV Rep_contra1)\<inverse>\<inverse> (Grp UNIV Rep_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2
    \<le> rel_G (Grp UNIV Abs_l1) (Grp UNIV Abs_l2) (Grp UNIV Abs_co1)
           (Grp UNIV Abs_co2) (Grp UNIV Rep_contra1)\<inverse>\<inverse>
           (Grp UNIV Rep_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>
apply (rule rel_G_mono)

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. T_l1 \<le> Grp UNIV Abs_l1
 2. T_l2 \<le> Grp UNIV Abs_l2
 3. T_co1 \<le> Grp UNIV Abs_co1
 4. T_co2 \<le> Grp UNIV Abs_co2
 5. (Grp UNIV Rep_contra1)\<inverse>\<inverse> \<le> T_contra1
 6. (Grp UNIV Rep_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse> \<le> T_contra2
apply (rule assms(1-4)[unfolded Quotient_alt_def5, THEN conjunct1])+

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (Grp UNIV Rep_contra1)\<inverse>\<inverse> \<le> T_contra1
 2. (Grp UNIV Rep_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse> \<le> T_contra2

apply (rule assms(5-6)[unfolded Quotient_alt_def5, THEN conjunct2, THEN conjunct1,
          unfolded conversep_le_swap])+

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

    \<le> Grp UNIV

        assms(1-6)[unfolded Quotient_alt_def5, THEN conjunct2, THEN conjunct2])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 OO
    rel_G T_l1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_l2\<inverse>\<inverse>
     T_co1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_co2\<inverse>\<inverse>
     T_contra1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_contra2\<inverse>\<inverse>
    \<le> rel_G (T_l1 OO T_l1\<inverse>\<inverse>)
           (T_l2 OO T_l2\<inverse>\<inverse>)
           (T_co1 OO T_co1\<inverse>\<inverse>)
           (T_co2 OO T_co2\<inverse>\<inverse>)
           (T_contra1 OO T_contra1\<inverse>\<inverse>)
           (T_contra2 OO T_contra2\<inverse>\<inverse>)
apply (rule rel_G_pos_distr)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rel_G_pos_distr_cond T_co1 T_co1\<inverse>\<inverse> T_co2
     T_co2\<inverse>\<inverse> T_contra1 T_contra1\<inverse>\<inverse>
     T_contra2 T_contra2\<inverse>\<inverse> ?uu36
apply (rule assms(7))

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  rel_G R_l1 R_l2 R_co1 R_co2 R_contra1 R_contra2 =
  rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2 OO
  (rel_G T_l1 T_l2 T_co1 T_co2 T_contra1 T_contra2)\<inverse>\<inverse>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
